meanings.definition: A low-growing shrub with red berries.
meanings.sent1: The bearberry bushes in the forest provide food for many animals.
meanings.sent2: I picked some bearberries to make jam.
meanings.sent3: The bearberry shrub whispered to the other plants, 'I'm the berry best around here!'
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks were as red as bearberries after spending the day in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The bearberry's bright red berries stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The red berry of the bearberry shrub.
meanings.sent1: She collected a handful of bearberries for her nature collection.
meanings.sent2: The bearberry was the perfect addition to the floral arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The bearberry rolled off the table and bounced across the floor, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His lips turned as red as bearberries after eating too many of them.
meanings.sent5: The bearberry's tartness made my mouth pucker with each bite.

meanings.sent1: I can bearberry the cold weather if I wear a warm coat.
meanings.sent2: She had to bearberry the long wait at the doctor's office.
meanings.sent3: The students tried to bearberry the boring lecture by doodling in their notebooks.
meanings.sent4: He had to bearberry the pain in his leg until he could get to the doctor.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't bearberry the suspense and peeked at the surprise party decorations.
